price: Wanda* Allah Ya shiryar, to, shĩ ne Mai shiryuwa, kuma wanda Ya ɓatar, to, waɗannan sũ ne mãsu hasãra.
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
footnotes: * An sifanta Musulmi da abin da aka sifanta Yahũdu da shi cewa a cikinsu akwai na kirki, kuma akwai miyãgu, dõmin yãƙi a tsakãnin gaskiya da ƙarya ya dõge.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadī waman yuḍ'lil fa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
